benchmark_details.name: LIFELONG-SOTOPIA
benchmark_details.overview: LIFELONG-SOTOPIA is designed to evaluate the social intelligence of language agents over lifelong social interactions by simulating multi-episode interactions in which agents role-play characters with specific social goals.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To evaluate the social intelligence of language agents over lifelong social interactions.

data.source: Generated scenarios based on the SOTOPIA database using the GPT-4 API.

methodology.calculation: Scores on BEL and GOAL dimensions are calculated based on ratings assigned post evaluation.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in terms of achieving social goals and believability.
methodology.baseline_results: Human evaluations consistently perform better than language agents across both BEL and GOAL dimensions.
methodology.validation: Evaluations conducted with both human participants and language agents to establish baseline comparisons.
